story.title: Our Story
story.introduction: Built in the 1930s as a corner pub, {{brand.shortName}} is now Cambridge’s home of pints and momo — 2 minutes from Premier Inn & Travelodge and 10 minutes to Abbey Stadium. After CAMRA’s Most Improved City Pub award in 2020, Lapen Inns relaunched the house in late 2024 with a Kathmandu-led kitchen, heated cabins, and wall-to-wall HD sports while keeping real ales, snugs, and free Wi-Fi for solo travellers, families, and away fans alike.

pillars.title: Hybrid comfort
pillars.description: Pub classics and authentic Nepalese plates in one room — perfect for groups with mixed tastes and kids in tow.

pillars.title: Hotel-doorstep easy
pillars.description: 2-minute walk from Premier Inn & Travelodge, 10 minutes to Abbey Stadium, with takeaway and fast service for matchdays.

pillars.title: Inclusive welcome
pillars.description: Home and away fans, families, and dogs greeted with free Wi-Fi, walk-ins in the bar, and accessible ramp/WC at the rear.

pillars.title: Heated garden life
pillars.description: Heated private cabins, covered projector, and year-round garden seating for watch parties or cosy dinners.

note.title: Best-of-both worlds on Newmarket Road
note.copy: We keep a seat for hotel guests, locals, and travelling fans: HD sport on, momo steamers running, cask ales pouring, and staff ready to adjust spice, portions, or pace so you make kick-off on time.

timeline.title: Art-deco corner pub opens
timeline.description: {{brand.shortName}} takes its place on Newmarket Road, becoming a local landmark with its distinctive facade, fireplaces, and timber snugs.

timeline.title: CAMRA ‘Most Improved City Pub’
timeline.description: Recognised by Cambridge & District CAMRA for revitalising beer quality and the community pub experience.

timeline.title: Nepalese kitchen & sports hub relaunch
timeline.description: Under Lapen Inns, the pub installs a Kathmandu-led kitchen, heated cabins, and HD projector screens — keeping real ales, roasts, and pub warmth.

timeline.title: Travelers’ Choice & 5★ hygiene
timeline.description: Tripadvisor Travelers’ Choice top 10% and a 5★ hygiene rating as Cambridge’s matchday HQ for pints, momo, and away-fan friendly service.
